content: Para fijar un clip, manténlo presionado. Después de una hora, se borrarán todos los clips que no estén fijados.Utiliza el ícono de edición para fijar, agregar o borrar clips:Para pegar un clip en el cuadro de texto, tócalo.Bienvenido al portapapeles de Gboard; todo texto que copies se guardará aquí.
creator: lizeth20210124albanodaniel

content: I have a similar problem. I use Zen Internet as ISP. Using TB, I can send emails over WiFi from home, but nowhere else. I can not send over mobile data anywhere. Proton Mail, Gmail and Outlook do not have these problems. K9 does. The message is SmtpResponseparser exception. Unexpected end of Stream. TB says my ISP settings are OK.
creator: Tombarkas

content:
I have this problem, too, only there is no sign that anything is wrong except no one gets my messages! Well, my sister, it's her domain. I guess I should've said my messages aren't going outside the domain.

Also, the page of what to do if your messages aren't going out is useless. I go were it says to go and what it says should be there isn't.
